After that, member goes to register room for the medical card issue and registration. After consultation, please go back counter 4 to retrieve your insurance card.

Firstly to register, register fee is RMB 7.00. You must pay in cash because register fee cannot apply direct billing. Only internal medicine is available in VIP department. If you require other medical consultations or large equipment diagnoses, please register at 10th floor VIP department, then go to the hospital VIP cashier desk located on the 1st floor of internal medicine building before treatment.

APP appointment: Insurance clients will make appointments and pay the consultation fees on APP. When they come to the insurance window to get register sheets, the consultation fees will go back to where they were paid in 15 business days. (Appointments can be made one week in advance. All department appointment resources are moved to APP except obstetrics and stomatology.)

column14:

妇产科
Internal medicine, Surgery, Dermatology, Othopaedic, Urinary Surgery, Paediatrics, Gynaecology and Obstetrics
column15:
1.国际部将于2018年3月31号开设周六门诊，时间：7:40-12:00。The international department will open the regular clinic on Staturday from the 31st March, starting from 7:30 to 12:00.
2.有儿科，并且只有儿内科。一般当天有儿科门诊医生出诊的话，是不建议挂急诊的。Pediatrics is available and only the internal medical department for children is available. Usually the emergency clinic is not suggested if the pediatric doctors are available.
3.婴幼儿预约时请提供户口本上登记的身份证号码和出生证明。Please provide ID Card Number as registered on the Household Book and Birth Certificate while make appointment for Baby and Infants.
4.请提前1天到1周电话预约门诊，预约时请提供就诊卡号和身份证号码，急诊为24小时不需预约。Please make the appointment 1 day  to 1 week in advance for outpatient ,while make the appointment please provide the Peking Union Hospital Patient ID Number (if this is not your first visit )and your ID  card Number.As for Emergency is 24 hours, and no need to make appointment in advance.
5.国际医疗部急诊就诊在内科楼南侧国际医疗部门诊2层。The Emergency Department is at the 2nd Floor of International Medical Center Building.
6.如果客户就诊没有保险卡或者带电子卡或者纸质保险卡，客户需要本人拨打客服热线申请身份确认函，如需帮助驻院代表可以协助客户。If the members don't have the insurance card or they hold the electronic one or the paper one, they need to call the CSR department to apply for the identity confirmation letter. The hospital representative will assist the members if needed.
7.就诊结束后需要先在收费处计费然后交回填写好的理赔单到商业保险接待处，核对并取回自己的保险卡。After you finish the consultation, you need to keep account at the cashier, return the Claim form back to the  Insurance Reception Room, check and get your insurance card back.
8.若需任何住院治疗或者手术，患者需要先看相应科室的门诊，门诊医生开具住院证。患者等床位期间，需要提前联系保险公司申请住院担保函，以确保在住院当天能享受直付服务。If you need any Inpatient Treatment or Surgeries, you need to see the general clinic of the related department and the doctor will issue the certificate for IP. When the members are waiting for the beds in the hospital, he or she needs to apply for the guarantee letter from the insurance company to ensure that they can enjoy the direct billing services the day he or she comes.
9.客户需要发送邮件到相应险种的邮箱，团险发送到pre-auth@cigna.com。个险发送到cignacmb.care@cigna.com。 邮件格式如下：1. 邮件主题：协和医院住院+保险卡号 2.  邮件内容：患者姓名，住院时间还有手术名字。 3. 邮件附件：身份证正面照片，保险卡正面照片还有跟住院有关的门诊病历的照片。如有任何问题，驻院代表可以进行协助。 The members need send e-mails to the corresponding mail-boxes. GHB members need to send the e-mail to pre-auth@cigna.com.  IPMI members need to send the e-mails to cignacmb.care@cigna.com. Please refer to the format below: 1. Subject: PUMCH IP+Insurance Card No.  2. Content: Patient name, IP time and the Surgery name. 3. Accessory: The picture of the ID card, Insurance card and the OP medical records that are related to IP. Any questions, the hospital representatives will assist you.
10.医院不接收不在本院出生小孩的疫苗接种。Vaccination is not available if the baby is not born in this hospital.
11.特约预约：需自行预约，不接受无故爽约。Making appointment with specialist：member need to make appointment by themselves. Cannot accept cancelling appointments without notice.
12.客户可以在协和医院app上进行预约。预约的时候需自行先交挂号费。就诊当日在保险窗口取号的同时，挂号费会原渠道返回。The members can make the appointment on the PUMCH APP。When they are making the appointment on the app, they need to pay for the consultation fee. When they get their registrations at the insurance window, the consultation fee will be returned the way how it is paid.
13.门诊体检：尽量提前一周预约。具体信息可咨询协和医院国际部健康管理中心010-69154266.
体检总金额低于保险保障额度的，需由保险公司出具担保函至医院，医院方可提供直付服务。
体检总金额高于保险保障额度的，由客户先自付体检总费用，而后申请事后理赔。
OP Health checkup: Please make appointment one week in advance.For the detailed information, you can consult the HMC in the international department through 010-69154266.
Total expenditure of health checkup is less than the limitation, insurance will issue GOP to hospital and hospital provide DB service for members.
Total expenditure of health checkup is beyond the limitation, please pay and claim.

http://ims.pumch.cn/Item/17085.aspx (Items for Men RMB 6500-7000)

column11:
0755-114 (预约电话 For Appointment)
Chinese: 1258006 (预约电话 For Appointment)
Chinese: 0755-83923333 (转 8607/8615)
0755-83534746 (Consulting)
column15:
1. 请提前1-7天预约挂号(不可预约当天号)。
预约方式: (1) 网络预约。在医院官网www.pkuszh.com首页打开“就医通”链接。(2) 电话预约。拨打0755-114再选择“8",或者使用中国移动手机拨打1258006，即可预约。预约成功后，您的手机会收到预约号，请于预约时段提前30分钟左右到达医院，并至门诊6楼预约取号窗挂号。(3) 手机APP”就医160“预约，客服热线：400-119-1160。
2. 如果您已在预约渠道支付了挂号费，请您就诊之前去6楼收费处找陈文英或潘雪莲老师说明情况，对方会给您开出一张免费号，此挂号费进行事后理赔。
1. Appointments are accepted 1 day to 7 days in advance (can't make an appointment on the same day).
Appointment methods: (1) By internet: Open the “medical treatment” link on the website www.pkuszh.com make an appointment. (Only Chinese version available currently). (2) By telephone: Call 114 and then select “8”, or use Chinese mobile phone call 1258006. (Chinese operator). A successful appointment will generate an appointment number to your mobile.Please arrive 30 minutes earlier than your appointment time and show your appointment number to the staff at registration window at 6th floor. (3) By phone APP ”就医160“, hotline: 400-119-1160.
2. If you have already paid consultation fee when making appoingment, please go to 6F to find Wenying Chen or Xuelian Pan and they will give you a receipt. Please claim afterwards.
Fax：0755-83068907

Shanghai Proton and Heavy Ion Center*
column8:

column15:
一、五大重点病种为：鼻咽癌、颅底颅内肿瘤、肺癌、肝癌、前列腺癌。
二、暂不适合收治的患者类型：
       1、14岁及以下儿童
       2、肿瘤患者有多发转移及终末期患者
       3、血液系统肿瘤（白血病、多发性骨髓瘤等）
       4、同一肿瘤部位已接受过2次及以上放射治疗的患者
       5、已进行放射性粒子植入治疗的患者
       6、胃肠道肿瘤（胃癌、除直肠癌外的肠癌以及颈、上胸段以下的食道癌）
       7、无法较长时间保持俯卧及仰卧体位的患者
1. The five major diseases are:
nasopharyngeal carcinoma, intracranial tumor of the skull base, lung cancer, liver cancer, and prostate cancer.
2. The type of patients not suitable for admission:
    1. 14 years old and younger
    2. tumor patients have multiple metastases and end-stage patients
    3. blood system tumors (leukemia, multiple myeloma, etc.)
    4. Patients who have received radiation therapy twice or more in the same tumor site
    5. Patients who have undergone radioactive particle implantation therapy
    6. gastrointestinal tumors (stomach cancer, intestinal cancer other than rectal cancer and esophageal cancer below the neck and upper thoracic)
    7, patients who cannot maintain prone and supine position for a long time
